automodHelpText:
Automod Setup

1 - Define the name of the rule (1st button)
2 - Set the trigger type (2nd button)
3 - Define the type of event (3rd button)
4 - Define an action (4th button)
5-
- If trigger is Keyword, set Keyword Filter or Regex Pattern.
- If the trigger is Keyword Presets, set the Keyword Filter.
- If the trigger is MentionSpam, set Mention Total Limit.

To complete, click the âœ… button.
